ctx: intros l1 l2 a Hcan1 Hcan2.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce plusP to an evaluable reference.

ctx: intros l1 l2 a Hcan1 Hcan2.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hcan1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros l1 l2 a Hcan1 Hcan2.
exceptions.exn: The reference Hcan2 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros l1 l2 a Hcan1 Hcan2. unfold canonical in Hcan1, Hcan2. unfold pluspf. unfold projsig1. unfold plusP. destruct Hcan1 as [Hcan1 _]. destruct Hcan2 as [Hcan2 _]. now repeat split.
